parameters.name: ExecutionId
parameters.description: The ID of the image creation task.

parameters.name: ImagePipelineId
parameters.description: The ID of the image template.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 500.

Default value: 50.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of `NextToken`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the image creation task. You can specify multiple values. Separate the values with commas (,). Example: `BUILDING,DISTRIBUTING`. Valid values:

*   BUILDING
*   DISTRIBUTING
*   RELEASING
*   SUCCESS
*   FAILED
*   CANCELLING
*   CANCELLED

> If you want to query the image creation tasks in all states, specify all values.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: > This parameter is not publicly available.
